file_content.text: We've sliced into the comms of Adacin and Zanisk. Happy eavesdropping, Commander.
We have guests, Lord Adacin.
I told you they would come. Let's give them a warm Sith welcome!
We have a task for you, Lord Wrad.
Kill the intruders. Prove your strength.
I told you Lord Wrad was weak.
Good help is hard to find. But at least now we've seen our enemies' tactics.
If that's all they can offer, they won't pose much challenge.
The intruders aren't dead. They're carving us to pieces!
We have nothing to fear, Zanisk. Their defeat is inevitable.
Our guests are wearing my patience thin. It's time we met them personally.
I couldn't agree more!
Alliance operatives have identified a major threat: a radicalized splinter group led by two powerful Sith Masters.
We tracked Lord Adacin and Lord Zanisk to a fortified volcano base on Ord Mantell. None of our agents have been able to breach the perimeter.
Adacin and Zanisk are ambitious. If you don't wipe them out, the galaxy will think we've gone soft.
Adacin and Zanisk are ruthless, even by Sith standards. We need to eliminate this threat before it spreads to other worlds.
Congratulations, Commander. You obliterated Adacin and Zanisk, crushing their uprising beneath the heel of the Alliance.
A handful of followers survived your assault, but they pose little threat. When you killed their masters, you broke their will to fight.
This victory sends a powerful message to the rest of the galaxy: any opposition will be dealt with swiftly, harshly, and without mercy.
Well done, Commander. You neutralized Adacin and Zanisk, ending their threat to galactic stability.
We're rounding up their followers, but without their masters driving them on, they don't pose much of a threat.
You showed the galaxy that the Alliance won't run from a fight--though I doubt it will be the last time you need to send that message.
